html: I am humbled by the support of my colleagues & excited to get to work reforming the @HouseAppropsGOP into one that prioritizes Members & delivers results for the American people. In an era of divided government, our committee will play a vital role in advancing GOP priorities.

html: I offer my condolences to the entire Bush family on the loss of former President George H.W. Bush. He led a life of service, and his leadership made the world safer and freer. He led his life with such dignity and honor -- we could all learn from his example.
text: I offer my condolences to the entire Bush family on the loss of former President George H.W. Bush. He led a life of service, and his leadership made the world safer and freer. He led his life with such dignity and honor -- we could all learn from his example.

html: The hard work to reform the committee begins today. I am looking forward to fighting for conservative values and holding the Democrats accountable in the 116th Congress.

html: While Congress has fought over some things, we've also worked in a bipartisan way to get the people's work done. It’s a record of results that’s making our country stronger and more prosperous, and I hope you’ll share it with your friends if they ask: “what has Congress done?”
text: While Congress has fought over some things, we've also worked in a bipartisan way to get the people's work done. It’s a record of results that’s making our country stronger and more prosperous, and I hope you’ll share it with your friends if they ask: “what has Congress done?”

html: CONSERVATIVE JUDGES: The Senate has confirmed President Trump’s judicial nominees at a historic pace: 84 total, including 29 circuit judges, 53 district court judges, and Brett Kavanaugh and Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court.
text: CONSERVATIVE JUDGES: The Senate has confirmed President Trump’s judicial nominees at a historic pace: 84 total, including 29 circuit judges, 53 district court judges, and Brett Kavanaugh and Neil Gorsuch to the Supreme Court.

html: OBAMACARE RELIEF: Repealed the individual mandate tax that forced Americans to buy something many didn’t want or couldn’t afford, and ended IPAB.
text: OBAMACARE RELIEF: Repealed the individual mandate tax that forced Americans to buy something many didn’t want or couldn’t afford, and ended IPAB.

html: BANKING REFORM: Provided Main Street borrowers and lenders relief from burdensome Dodd-Frank red tape for the first time.
text: BANKING REFORM: Provided Main Street borrowers and lenders relief from burdensome Dodd-Frank red tape for the first time.

html: ENERGY: Opened Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR), one of the largest untapped conventional oilfields in North America, to help keep energy affordable.
text: ENERGY: Opened Arctic National Wildlife Refuge (ANWR), one of the largest untapped conventional oilfields in North America, to help keep energy affordable.

html: MILITARY FUNDING: After many years of neglecting our national security, our troop readiness, and the critical maintenance of our defense infrastructure, we’ve provided record funding to @DeptofDefense, including the largest pay increase in nine years.
text: MILITARY FUNDING: After many years of neglecting our national security, our troop readiness, and the critical maintenance of our defense infrastructure, we’ve provided record funding to @DeptofDefense, including the largest pay increase in nine years.

html: TAX REFORM: Reformed America’s tax code for the first time in 31 years, putting more money in the pockets of American families and creating more opportunity for them and their children.
text: TAX REFORM: Reformed America’s tax code for the first time in 31 years, putting more money in the pockets of American families and creating more opportunity for them and their children.

html: PREVENTING MASS SHOOTINGS: Enacted Fix NICS and STOP School Violence Act to help protect the American people from mass shootings and fix the broken background check system.
text: PREVENTING MASS SHOOTINGS: Enacted Fix NICS and STOP School Violence Act to help protect the American people from mass shootings and fix the broken background check system.

html: OPIOID LEGISLATION: Combating the nation’s worst public health crisis with a package of proposals to fight a widespread epidemic, including stopping fentanyl at the border and spurring development of new non-addictive painkillers.
text: OPIOID LEGISLATION: Combating the nation’s worst public health crisis with a package of proposals to fight a widespread epidemic, including stopping fentanyl at the border and spurring development of new non-addictive painkillers.

html: FIGHTING SEX TRAFFICKING: Enacted the Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act to combat trafficking.
text: FIGHTING SEX TRAFFICKING: Enacted the Fight Online Sex Trafficking Act to combat trafficking.

html: VICTIMS’ RIGHTS: Passed the Justice Served Act to provide funds to prosecute cold cases solved by DNA evidence and the SAFER Act to help reduce the rape kit backlog.
text: VICTIMS’ RIGHTS: Passed the Justice Served Act to provide funds to prosecute cold cases solved by DNA evidence and the SAFER Act to help reduce the rape kit backlog.

html: VETERANS’ BENEFITS REFORM: Delivered real reform and choice to American veterans with the VA MISSION Act. Provided the largest funding increase in history for veterans care and services, and to modernize the @DeptVetAffairs’s electronic health record system.
text: VETERANS’ BENEFITS REFORM: Delivered real reform and choice to American veterans with the VA MISSION Act. Provided the largest funding increase in history for veterans care and services, and to modernize the @DeptVetAffairs’s electronic health record system.

html: Nor is it a secret that as a result of recent Hurricane recovery and relief efforts being stretched thin over the past two years, the current federal budget is step-funding (using incremental appropriation) for its other flood-control and water infrastructure projects.

html: My plan will: *Provide federal grant $ to school districts seeking to install metal detectors; *Require any school receiving $ to limit entrances so that metal detectors provide protection; *Require any school applying to work w/ local law enforcement 2 qualify for the grant.

html: Congress has finally delivered on the promise of tax reform, and I am proud to have supported this historic tax bill.
text: Congress has finally delivered on the promise of tax reform, and I am proud to have supported this historic tax bill.

html: There has been a lot of mischaracterization of what this bill does, but the American people will know the truth when they start to see more money in their paychecks as early as February of next year.
text: There has been a lot of mischaracterization of what this bill does, but the American people will know the truth when they start to see more money in their paychecks as early as February of next year.

html: Businesses will be able to immediately write off the full cost of new equipment to improve operations and enhance the skills of their workers.
text: Businesses will be able to immediately write off the full cost of new equipment to improve operations and enhance the skills of their workers.

html: This legislation delivers real relief to businesses by lowering the corporate tax rate to 21 percent, down from 35 percent. In fact, it reduces taxes on small businesses to the lowest they’ve been in 40 years.
text: This legislation delivers real relief to businesses by lowering the corporate tax rate to 21 percent, down from 35 percent. In fact, it reduces taxes on small businesses to the lowest they’ve been in 40 years.

html: It also allows Texans to write off up to $10,000 of their property taxes.
text: It also allows Texans to write off up to $10,000 of their property taxes.

html: With this bill, the typical family of four earning the median family income of $73,000 will receive a tax cut of $2,059. The bill also expands the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000 for single filers and married couples to help parents with the cost of raising children.
text: With this bill, the typical family of four earning the median family income of $73,000 will receive a tax cut of $2,059. The bill also expands the Child Tax Credit from $1,000 to $2,000 for single filers and married couples to help parents with the cost of raising children.

html: The bill nearly doubles the standard tax deduction and reduces loopholes, while preserving important tax breaks such as the teacher tax deduction for classroom expenses.
text: The bill nearly doubles the standard tax deduction and reduces loopholes, while preserving important tax breaks such as the teacher tax deduction for classroom expenses.

html: In addition, this legislation not only protects current American jobs but also encourages companies who have moved overseas to come home and bring jobs back to Texas.
text: In addition, this legislation not only protects current American jobs but also encourages companies who have moved overseas to come home and bring jobs back to Texas.

 Lowers tax rates for everyday Americans

 Stops American jobs from moving overseas
